verbs.description: [ARG0: Icahn] [V: makes] [ARG1: his statement] [ARG2: to The Washington Post] , [ARGM-PRD: saying he was concerned about the newspaper 's characterization of his relationship with Trump] .
[ARG0: Icahn] makes his statement to The Washington Post , [V: saying] [ARG1: he was concerned about the newspaper 's characterization of his relationship with Trump] .
Icahn makes his statement to The Washington Post , saying [ARG1: he] [V: was] [ARG2: concerned about the newspaper 's characterization of his relationship with Trump] .
